property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: U.S. Navy interpreter working with Dominican students, Dominican Republic

note.text: In this section, you will learn to communicate using an interpreter. Specifically, you will learn to:

- Recognize different types of interpretation.
- Identify the three categories of interpreters used by the military.
- List factors that may be relevant in interpreter selection.
- Recognize strategies for building rapport with your interpreter.
- Prepare for an interpreted conversation with your interpreter.
- Identify the four key concepts for communicating effectively while using an interpreter.
